main event: A strange egg-shaped object emitting grayish-green and red light was observed over Gorontalo in North Celebes on February 23, 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed by a civilian and reported to Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program that investigated UFOs.
The object was described as egg-shaped and radiating a grayish-green light with a red light seen from the tail.
It flew swiftly in a north to south direction.
The observation took place in Celebes, reported by a civilian with insufficient data for a complete evaluation.
The report was declassified 12 years after the observation, in line with DOD directives.
sighted object: strange egg-shaped object emitting grayish-green and red light
